CAREER_CARD.BODY: I'm a self taught software developer who managed to find his way into the tech industry. I've worked on some pretty badass projects so far and always looking forward to working on more. I genuinely love coding and would even go as far to say that I consider it more of a hobby than an occupation. It's more than just the code. It's design. It's elegant. It's pretty.

VIBECHECK_LITE.BODY: Vibecheck Lite is a functional fashion-weather lifestyle tool to assist the user in deciding what to wear for the day based on the weather. Instead of traditionally checking the weather app and thinking about what's most appropriate to wear let us do that for you. We got you.

SECONDHAND_CARD.BODY: I'm a secondhand shopping addict but at the same time a minimalist which is quite the conundrum. To solve this problem I run a secondhand Instagram store and hold occasional clothing markets to buy, sell, trade, and give away clothes that are often accompanied by a partayyy.

ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_1: Hi! My name is Harry, a self taught web developer from Toronto, Canada. I am a passionate about computer programming and actually got into it out of hobby to automate small computer tasks at home. I was introducted to computer science in highschool and loved writing code since then, as a career and of work.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_2: I have many other passions outside of software development including latin social dancing, skateboarding, amateur djing, and freestyle rap to name a few.

SERVICES_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_1: Professional web developer capable of handling your web site/application needs. Always open to hearing about new and interesting opportunities so feel free to contact me.

LOADING.MESSAGE: Please enable location access. We will use your weather location to determine an appropriate outfit.
